revision.text:
[[File:KeyItems11.png|Currently available Key Items|right|400px]] '''Key Items''' are special items obtained by player as they progress through the game. ==Usage== Key Items are active automatically upon acquisition. To see acquired Key Items go to Start Menu > Items > Key Items. ==List of Items== {|class="wikitable sortable" ! ! Name ! How to obtain ! Effect |- | [[File:Teachy_tv.png|24px]] | [[Teachy TV]] | Given by [[Professor Oak]] at the start of the game | N/A |- | [[File:Coin_case.png|24px]] | [[Coin Case]] | Given by [[Professor Oak]] at the start of the game | N/A |- | [[File:Pokeball_bag.png|24px]] | [[Pokéball Bag]] | Given by [[Professor Oak]] at the start of the game | N/A |- | [[File:Town_map.png|24px]] | [[Town Map]] | Get 10 kills on [[Kanto]] Route 1 | Unlocks Town Map panel |- | [[File:Factory_key.png|24px]] | [[Factory Key]] | Currently unobtainable | N/A |- | [[File:Dungeon_ticket.png|24px]] | [[Dungeon Ticket]] | Purchasable at [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Viridian City]] for 100 [[Quest Points]] {{Questpoints}} | Allows entry to [[Dungeons|dungeons]] at the cost of [[Dungeon Tokens]] {{dungeontokens}} |- | [[File:Super_rod.png|24px]] | [[Super Rod]] | Get 10 kills on [[Kanto]] Route 12 | Allows water Pokémon to be encountered and caught in the wild |- | [[File:Holo_caster.png|24px]] | [[Holo Caster]] | Catch 110 different Pokemon or more | Allows users to see and track [[Achievements]] |- | [[File:Mystery_egg.png|24px]] | [[Mystery Egg]] | Get 10 kills on [[Kanto]] Route 1 | Opens [[Pokemon Day Care|Pokémon Day Care]] |- | [[File:Safari_ticket.png|24px]] | [[Safari Ticket]] | Clear the Fuchsia Gym in [[Kanto]] | Allows entry to the [[Kanto]] [[Safari Zone]] |- | [[File:Wailmer_pail.png|24px]] | [[Wailmer Pail]] | Unlock [[Kanto]] Route 14 | Allows entry to the [[Farm]] |- | [[File:Explorer_kit.png|24px]] | [[Explorer Kit]] | Purchasable at [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Cinnabar Island]] for 5000 [[Quest Points]] {{Questpoints}} | Allows entry to the [[Underground]] |- | [[File:Event_calendar.png|24px]] | [[Event Calendar]] | Currently unobtainable | N/A |- | [[File:Shard_case.png|24px]] | [[Gem Case]] | Clear the Viridian Gym in [[Kanto]] | Allows the collection of [[Gems]] and the purchase of Gem upgrades |- | [[File:DNA_splicers.png|24px]] | [[DNA Splicers]] | Clear the [[Giant Chasm]] dungeon in [[Unova]] | N/A |- | [[File:Pokérus.png|24px]] | [[Pokérus]] | Clear the [[Distortion World]] dungeon in [[Sinnoh]] | Gives the Player Pokérus and EVs |} {{Key Items}}
